mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT QNA_NUM, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(QNA_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') QNA_REGDATE, QNA_REPLY, TO_CHAR(QNA_REPLY_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') QNA_REPLY_REGDATE, PRODUCT_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY PRODUCT_CODE DESC) ROWN FROM QNA_TB2 WHERE PRODUCT_CODE =${code}) WHERE ROWN BETWEEN #{page} AND #{page1};

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT QNA_NUM, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, TO_CHAR(QNA_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') QNA_REGDATE, QNA_REPLY, TO_CHAR(QNA_REPLY_REGDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI') QNA_REPLY_REGDATE , USER_ID, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY USER_ID DESC) ROWN FROM QNA_TB2 WHERE USER_ID=#{userid}) WHERE ROWN BETWEEN #{page} AND #{page1};

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_REGDATE, QNA_REPLY, QNA_REPLY_REGDATE, SELLER_ID, PRODUCT_CODE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY SELLER_ID DESC) ROWN FROM ( SELECT QNA_NUM, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_REGDATE, QNA_REPLY, QNA_REPLY_REGDATE, SELLER_ID, PROQNA.PRODUCT_CODE FROM ( SELECT QNA_NUM, QNA_TITLE, QNA_CONTENT, QNA_REGDATE, QNA_REPLY, QNA_REPLY_REGDATE, PRODUCT.PRODUCT_CODE FROM PRODUCT, QnA_TB2 WHERE PRODUCT.PRODUCT_CODE = QnA_TB2.PRODUCT_CODE )PROQNA, SELLER ) WHERE SELLER_ID =#{userid}) WHERE ROWN BETWEEN #{page} AND #{page1};
